title: The Cockroach
description: Cockroaches are ancient insects known for their adaptability and resilience. They have been around for over 300 million years and can survive in extreme conditions.

questions.question: How long can cockroaches survive without their heads?
What allows cockroaches to survive in extreme conditions?
options: Their ability to hold their breath for long periods
questions.correct_answer: Their ability to hold their breath for long periods

questions.question: How many species of cockroaches exist worldwide?
What do cockroaches primarily feed on?
Why are cockroaches considered one of the most adaptable insects?
